on_enter.say: Right, let's kick things off by preheating the oven to 180 degrees Celsius. Get it nice and warm for our lovely pie!

steps.descr: Peel the potatoes, halving any larger ones, then cook in a pan of boiling salted water for 20 minutes, or until tender.

on_enter.say: Let's get those potatoes peeled and into a pot of boiling salted water. Cook them for about 20 minutes until they're beautifully tender.

steps.instructions: Peel the potatoes, halving any larger ones, then cook in a pan of boiling salted water for 20 minutes, or until tender.

steps.descr: Trim, finely chop and reserve the broccoli stalk. Chop the head into florets and add to the pan with the eggs, if using, for the last 7 minutes.

on_enter.say: Now, let's trim and chop the broccoli. Add the florets to the pot for the last 7 minutes of cooking. It'll be lovely and green!

steps.instructions: Trim, finely chop and reserve the broccoli stalk. Chop the head into florets and add to the pan with the eggs, if using, for the last 7 minutes.

steps.descr: Cool the potatoes and broccoli, and steam dry.

on_enter.say: Great job! Now let's cool those potatoes and broccoli. Let them steam dry so they're ready for the next step.

steps.instructions: Cool the potatoes and broccoli, and steam dry.

steps.descr: Meanwhile, trim the leeks, halve lengthways, then wash and finely slice.

on_enter.say: While the veggies are cooling, let's get those leeks sorted. Trim, halve, wash, and slice them finely. They'll add a lovely sweetness.

steps.instructions: Meanwhile, trim the leeks, halve lengthways, then wash and finely slice.

steps.descr: Place in a large shallow casserole pan on a medium heat with olive oil and the chopped broccoli stalk. Cook for 10 minutes, or until soft, stirring regularly.

on_enter.say: Pop those leeks and broccoli stalks into a pan with some olive oil. Cook them gently for about 10 minutes until they're nice and soft.

steps.instructions: Place in a large shallow casserole pan on a medium heat with olive oil and the chopped broccoli stalk. Cook for 10 minutes, or until soft, stirring regularly.

steps.descr: Stir in the flour and mustard, then gradually stir in the milk. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, then season to perfection.

on_enter.say: Let's make a lovely sauce. Stir in the flour and mustard, then slowly add the milk. Simmer it gently for 5 minutes, giving it a stir now and then.

steps.instructions: Stir in the flour and mustard, then gradually stir in the milk. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, then season to perfection.

steps.descr: Add the fish chunks and simmer for another 5 minutes, then grate in most of the cheese.

on_enter.say: Time to add the fish chunks. Let them simmer for another 5 minutes, then grate in most of that lovely cheese. It's going to be delicious!

steps.instructions: Add the fish chunks and simmer for another 5 minutes, then grate in most of the cheese.

steps.descr: Mash the potato and broccoli – rustic or smooth, the choice is yours.

on_enter.say: Let's mash those potatoes and broccoli. You can go rustic or smooth, whatever you fancy!

steps.instructions: Mash the potato and broccoli – rustic or smooth, the choice is yours.

steps.descr: Season to perfection, then spoon over the dish, fork from sustainable sources up the top for added texture, grate over the last bit of cheese and spritz with oil.

on_enter.say: Season everything to perfection, then spoon it over the dish. Add some texture with a fork, grate over the last of the cheese, and give it a spritz of oil.

steps.instructions: Season to perfection, then spoon over the dish, fork from sustainable sources up the top for added texture, grate over the last bit of cheese and spritz with oil.

steps.descr: Bake for 35 minutes, or until golden and bubbling. Rest for 5 minutes, sprinkle over the remaining chives and serve with lemon wedges.

on_enter.say: Time to bake our pie! Pop it in the oven for 35 minutes until it's golden and bubbling. Let it rest for 5 minutes, then sprinkle with chives and serve with lemon wedges. Enjoy!

steps.instructions: Bake for 35 minutes, or until golden and bubbling. Rest for 5 minutes, sprinkle over the remaining chives and serve with lemon wedges.
